abstract: Brazil’s former president Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva has throat cancer and is poised to begin chemotherapy.
snippet: The swift disclosure of the illness of Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva, Brazil’s former president, is a contrast with continuing mystery surrounding the health of Hugo Chávez.
lead_paragraph: The swift disclosure of the illness of Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva, Brazil’s former president, is a contrast with continuing mystery surrounding the health of Hugo Chávez.

headline.main: Former Leader of Brazil Is Said to Have Throat Cancer
headline.print_headline: Former Leader Of Brazil Is Said to Have Throat Cancer
headline.seo: Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva of Brazil Has Throat Cancer
